Package fr.minuskube.inv.util

Class ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.minuskube.inv.util.ItemBuilder
  • public class ItemBuilder
extends Object
    This is a simple class that simplifies the creation of ItemStacks

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ItemBuilder amount​(int amount)
      Sets a new amount for this item stack
      ItemBuilder appendLore​(String line)
      Appends the given line to the end of the lore.
      ItemStack build()
      Applies all the modifications to the item meta to the item stack and returns the item stack
      ClickableItem build​(Consumer<ItemClickData> consumer)
      Applies all the modifications to the item meta to the item stack and the creates a new clickable item with the given click handler
      static ItemBuilder builder​(ClickableItem item)
      Create a new ItemBuilder instance based on the existing stack in the clickable item

      The stack is copied using ItemStack(ItemStack)
      static ItemBuilder builder​(ItemStack stack)
      Create a new ItemBuilder instance based on an existing stack.
      static ItemBuilder builder​(Material material)
      Create a new ItemBuilder instance creating an ItemStack with the given material
      static ItemBuilder builder​(Material material, int amount)
      Create a new ItemBuilder instance creating an ItemStack with the given material and amount
      ItemBuilder enchantment​(Enchantment enchantment)
      Adds an enchantment with the level 1 to the item stack
      ItemBuilder enchantment​(Enchantment enchantment, int level)
      Adds an enchantment directly to the item stack without level restrictions
      ItemBuilder leatherColor​(Color color)
      Applies the given color to the item if the item is leather armor, so it MUST be one of the following LEATHER_HELMET LEATHER_CHESTPLATE LEATHER_LEGGINGS LEATHER_BOOTS
      ItemBuilder lore​(String lore)
      Sets the lore to the given string.
      ItemBuilder lore​(String[] lore)
      Sets the lore for the item based on the string array passed to it
      ItemBuilder lore​(List<String> lore)
      Sets the lore for the item based on the string array passed to it
      ItemBuilder name​(String displayName)
      Sets the displayName of the item to the given input
      ItemBuilder removeLore​(String line)
      Removes a line from the current lore using List.remove(Object)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static ItemBuilder builder​(ItemStack stack)
        Create a new ItemBuilder instance based on an existing stack.

        The stack is copied using ItemStack(ItemStack)
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to use as a base
        Returns:
        A new ItemBuilder instance

      • builder

        public static ItemBuilder builder​(ClickableItem item)
        Create a new ItemBuilder instance based on the existing stack in the clickable item

        The stack is copied using ItemStack(ItemStack)
        Parameters:
        item - The clickable item of which the item stack should be used
        Returns:
        A new ItemBuilder instance

      • builder

        public static ItemBuilder builder​(Material material,
                                  int amount)
        Create a new ItemBuilder instance creating an ItemStack with the given material and amount
        Parameters:
        material - The material to use for the ItemStack
        amount - The amount of the item that should be used
        Returns:
        A new ItemBuilder instance

      • builder

        public static ItemBuilder builder​(Material material)
        Create a new ItemBuilder instance creating an ItemStack with the given material
        Parameters:
        material - The material to use for the ItemStack
        Returns:
        A new ItemBuilder instance

      • name

        public ItemBuilder name​(String displayName)
        Sets the displayName of the item to the given input
        Parameters:
        displayName - The new display name
        Returns:
        this instance

      • lore

        public ItemBuilder lore​(String[] lore)
        Sets the lore for the item based on the string array passed to it
        Parameters:
        lore - The new lore, where each element is a new line
        Returns:
        this instance

      • lore

        public ItemBuilder lore​(List<String> lore)
        Sets the lore for the item based on the string array passed to it
        Parameters:
        lore - The new lore, where each element is a new line
        Returns:
        this instance

      • lore

        public ItemBuilder lore​(String lore)
        Sets the lore to the given string. If a newline character (\n) is found, the lore will be split into an additional line
        Parameters:
        lore - The new lore, each line separated by a \n
        Returns:
        this instance

      • appendLore

        public ItemBuilder appendLore​(String line)
        Appends the given line to the end of the lore. Newline characters (\n) will be ignored
        Parameters:
        line - The line of lore, that should be appended to the existing lines
        Returns:
        this instance

      • removeLore

        public ItemBuilder removeLore​(String line)
        Removes a line from the current lore using List.remove(Object)
        Parameters:
        line - The line of lore, that should be removed
        Returns:
        this instance

      • amount

        public ItemBuilder amount​(int amount)
        Sets a new amount for this item stack
        Parameters:
        amount - The new amount
        Returns:
        this instance

      • leatherColor

        public ItemBuilder leatherColor​(Color color)
        Applies the given color to the item if the item is leather armor, so it MUST be one of the following
        • LEATHER_HELMET
        • LEATHER_CHESTPLATE
        • LEATHER_LEGGINGS
        • LEATHER_BOOTS
        Parameters:
        color - The new color that should be applied
        Returns:
        this instance
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - This exception is thrown, if the material is NOT one of the listed types

      • enchantment

        public ItemBuilder enchantment​(Enchantment enchantment,
                               int level)
        Adds an enchantment directly to the item stack without level restrictions
        Parameters:
        enchantment - The enchantment to add
        level - The level of the enchantment
        Returns:
        this instance

      • enchantment

        public ItemBuilder enchantment​(Enchantment enchantment)
        Adds an enchantment with the level 1 to the item stack
        Parameters:
        enchantment - The enchantment to add
        Returns:
        this instance

      • build

        public ItemStack build()
        Applies all the modifications to the item meta to the item stack and returns the item stack
        Returns:
        The modified item stack

      • build

        public ClickableItem build​(Consumer<ItemClickData> consumer)
        Applies all the modifications to the item meta to the item stack and the creates a new clickable item with the given click handler
        Parameters:
        consumer - the consumer which will be called when the item is clicked
        Returns:
        The newly created clickable item
